product.title: Tinker Bell and the Lost Treasure | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Tinker Bell and the Lost Treasure

With the blue moon on the rise and Pixie Hollow in danger of losing its pixie dust, all eyes are on Tinker Bell to create a precious scepter that will give renewed life to the Pixie Dust Tree. When things go horribly wrong and the scepter breaks, Tink goes on an amazing journey where she realizes only friendship can save her home.

Tie-in Activity: Help your child create a scepter just like Tink's. Take an unwanted piece of costume jewelry and glue it to a chopstick or an unsharpened pencil. Sit back and watch the magic happen.
